languages.text: "Удовлетворительно. Чернь удерживаем в страхе и почтении, отрабатываем версии. Скоро вычислим мерзавца, клянусь своими погонами".
"Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."
languages.original_text: "Удовлетворительно. Чернь удерживаем в страхе и почтении, отрабатываем версии. Скоро вычислим мерзавца, клянусь своими погонами".

traits.locale_text: "Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."
"Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."
"Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon; I can feel it."
"Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my good name."
"Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."

"Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."

languages.text: « Bien. Nous faisons régner l'ordre et la terreur parmi la racaille pendant que nous passons les suspects en revue. Je parierais mes galons que nous n'allons pas tarder à démasquer notre coupable. »
languages.original_text: "Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."

traits.locale_text: « Bien. Nous faisons régner l'ordre et la terreur parmi la racaille pendant que nous passons les suspects en revue. Je parierais mes galons que nous n'allons pas tarder à démasquer notre coupable. »

languages.text: «Aceptable. Estamos manteniendo el nivel necesario de miedo y respeto entre la chusma conforme procesamos a los sospechosos. Pronto encontraremos al culpable, lo juro por mi cargo».
languages.original_text: "Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."

traits.locale_text: «Aceptable. Estamos manteniendo el nivel necesario de miedo y respeto entre la chusma conforme procesamos a los sospechosos. Pronto encontraremos al culpable, lo juro por mi cargo».

languages.text: “很令人满意。在调查嫌疑犯的过程中，那些乌合之众始终对我们充满了恐惧与敬畏。用不了多久，我们就能找到罪魁祸首，我以我的军衔发誓。”
languages.original_text: "Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."

traits.locale_text: “很令人满意。在调查嫌疑犯的过程中，那些乌合之众始终对我们充满了恐惧与敬畏。用不了多久，我们就能找到罪魁祸首，我以我的军衔发誓。”

languages.text: 「満足です。私たちは容疑者たちを調べながら、民衆の間に恐怖と尊敬を保っている。このランクに誓って、犯人はすぐに見つけます」
languages.original_text: "Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."

traits.locale_text: 「満足です。私たちは容疑者たちを調べながら、民衆の間に恐怖と尊敬を保っている。このランクに誓って、犯人はすぐに見つけます」

languages.text: "Zufriedenstellend. Wir halten die Furcht und den Respekt im Pöbel aufrecht, während wir unsere Verdächtigen durchgehen. Wir werden den Täter bald finden, das schwöre ich bei meinem Rang."
languages.original_text: "Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."

traits.locale_text: "Zufriedenstellend. Wir halten die Furcht und den Respekt im Pöbel aufrecht, während wir unsere Verdächtigen durchgehen. Wir werden den Täter bald finden, das schwöre ich bei meinem Rang."

languages.text: "Memnun edici şekilde gidiyor. Şüphelilerimizi gözden geçirirken ayaktakımına korku ve hürmet aşılamaya devam ediyoruz. Rütbem üzerine yemin ederim ki yakında suçluyu bulacağız."
languages.original_text: "Satisfactory. We are maintaining fear and respect among the rabble as we go through our suspects. We will find the culprit soon, I swear it on my rank."
